name: Reverse Golf
description:
Ever failed at minigolf? Failed so hard you wanted to tilt the whole course? No problem... Feel the power to ROTATE the golf course as you desire my friend! But beware, rotation is not only a gift, it is a challenge!


Use your Keyboard and rotate the course with W, A, S, D. Use the mouse to move the camera. You can also zoom in and out with your mouse wheel. Sounds easy? Well, the rotation will teach you a lesson.

This game was developed as part of the KenneyJam 2021 #kenneyjam using the Godot Engine.

The code is open-source on Github: https://github.com/vojay-dev/reverse-golf

The development was done live on Twitch, feel free to check out: twitch.tv/vojay.
